channel.title: CVE Feed for Milesight -- Video Management Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Milesight -- Video Management Systems

item.title: CVE-2022-3001|2024-08-03T00:52:59.889Z -- milesight -- video%20management%20systems
item.description: This vulnerability exists in Milesight Video Management Systems (VMS), all firmware versions prior to 40.7.0.79-r1, due to improper input handling at cameraâ€™s web-based management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted http request on the targeted network camera. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow the attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition on the targeted device.
